abstracts.cdata!:
The First Structural Adjustment Loan
            will support the Government's 1988-89 program of
            economic adjustment. The main goals of the plan are to: (a)
            increase public sector savings; (b) reduce the overall
            fiscal deficit in 1989; and (c) promote external balance and
            increase transparency in the foreign exchange market by
            permitting a greater proportion of transactions to take
            place at market-determined rates. Also, the plan aims to
            sterilize the excess money supply and avoid it's
            inflationary impact, and begin the process of liberalization
            of interest rate policies by the elimination of distortions
            among discounted credit lines.
